updated"}},"earnedByReferral(address,address)":{"params":{"account":"The address to check","token":"The token address to check"},"return":"earned tokens by receive tokens","params":{"token":"The token address to distribute"}},"getTokensWithReferral(address,address)":{"details":"function to be called to receive tokens","params":{"referral":"Address to an not"},"isOwner()":{"details":"Returns true if the caller is the current owner."},"lastUpdate(address,address)":{"params":{"account":"The address to check","token":"The token address to check"},"return":"last tokens received timestamp"},"nextClaimTime(address,address)":{"params":{"account":"The address to check","token":"The token address to check"},"return":"time of next available claim or zero"},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"receivedTokens(address,address)":{"params":{"account":"The address to check","token":"The token address to check"},"return":"received token amount for the given address"},"recoverERC20(address,uint256)":{"details":"Remember that only owner can call so be careful when use on contracts generated from other contracts.","params":{"tokenAddress":"The token contract address","tokenAmount":"Number of tokens to be sent"}},"remainingTokens(address)":{"details":"return the number of remaining tokens to It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. getTokensWithReferral(address,address).details: function to be called to receive tokens

params.referral: Address to an account that is referring

isEnabled(address).return: if faucet is enabled or not

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

nextClaimTime(address,address).return: time of next available claim or zero

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

receivedTokens(address,address).return: received token amount for the given address

recoverERC20(address,uint256).details: Remember that only owner can call so be careful when use on contracts generated from other contracts.

params.tokenAmount: Number of tokens to be sent

remainingTokens(address).details: return the number of remaining tokens to distribute

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
